title: Rocky is here!
sub: Hi! This is Rocky! Nice to meet you all!, kitties in Yah-Den MainLand!
content:
This is rocky! A cat who wants to be cuter while also a mania of technology!

Nice to meet you, kitties in Yah Den Mainland!

title: Me relaxing would be like:
content:
Chocolate Meow chocolate... More... =v=

(Actually sometimes I'm even more addicted to that than Kyuzo the king!)

title: Let's give Jubby a surprise...
sub: Death from above: Bonk the cat over their head to give them a lethal hit!
content:
Death from above: Bonk the cat over their head to give them a lethal hit!

Note: No cat have been hurt in this picture.

title: Under the sun
content:
What a wonderful day outside. =v=
How could I enjoy such a wonderful day without chocolate meow cookie?
Om nom nom nom... Delicious!

title: Nyahoo!!! Here's Rocky, the magician!!!
content:
The Halloween is coming!
After talking with my friends, I decided to dress up as a magician!!!
Wearing the dark magician suit, riding on the magical sweeper, and --- Let's GO!!! o(≧▽≦)o

title: My belly... Is inflating like balloon!
sub: I will never... Eat meow chocolate cookie indiscriminantly again...
content:
One day I came out finding a package of meow chocolate cookie in my mailbox. It didn't say where did it come from.
    However, I still accepted, took it to the backyard and started enjoying.
    I didn't feel something weird when I took the first bite, but a few moments later, I started... Feeling abnormal...
    I discovered that my belly is growing bigger, just like a balloon being inflatted!
    Sooner, my belly became round and big, just like a balloon. I can hardly move... Ah... I'll never eat things indiscriminantly again!

title: Does this waffle rocky look delicious?
content:
A few days ago I and other cats helped CookBaron to choose the best clothes!
And this, and what of other participated cats is what she awarded us!
Does this looks delicious? The answer is yes for me. =v=

title: Here comes Rocky the angel!
content:
I've just received a magical gift!
    This magical gift quickly spreaded through my body, and suddenly, I foundthat I got a pair of wings! Just like an angel!
    Nyahooo!!! I'm flying in the sky freely! Feeling so great!!!

title: Little Rocky sleeping on the moon...
sub: Meow... Hope you can have a good sleep too!

title: The pumkin that came a little late.
sub: Maybe next halloween I will decorate myself in this way!
content:
Nyahoo!!! Trick or treat!! Give me your candy!!!
    I know it might be a little late to do so now...
    But anyway, maybe next halloween I'll dress up like this!

title: Santa Rocky, but in legacy DNAxCAT style
content:
Santa Rocky, but in legacy DNAxCAT style.

Concerned about Christmas gifts? Worried of not getting gifts?

Let's go! Meet Rocky!

title: Playing with Hideki in the Snow Land!
content:
It was really funny playing with Hideki in the Snow Land!
But... It was really cold being made into snowman... A--Choo!!!

title: Where did this... *POW!*
sub: Rocky was slained by Shanshan using snow ball.
content:
One day when playing with others in the Snow Land...
Let's play snow ball, Shanshan! Wait... Where did this... *POW!*

Shanshan  ⚪ ➡  Rocky

title: Rocky is getting ready for Christmas!
sub: I'd like to have fun with you all during this Christmas!
content:
The Christmas is just around the corner, andthis is going to be my first Christmas in the Meow Kingdom!
I'd like to have fun with you all during this Christmas!

title: Happy Birthday to Shuanglin!!!
sub: He seems pretty like my surprise!
content:
It's Shuanglin's birthday today! And I'm going to give him a surprise!
With the cake on my hands, hiding in a corner, waiting for Shuanglin...
When he appeared...

Ta--da!!! Happy birthday to you, Shuanglin!!!


Shuanglin, who usually has a long face, finally smiled!

title: Merry Christmas!!!
content:
Nyahoo!!!

Merry Christmas, Everyone!!!

title: Looks like... I'm OK as a girl wwwww
content:
For many times, I was misrecognized as a girl mainly because of the ribbon, and my tone.
Seems that I'm perfect for being a girl wwwww

(And... that's what I wish.)

title: Rocky is here, wishing everyone having a happy new year!
content:
Nyahoo!!! This is my first time having Spring Festival* after moving to the Meow Kingdom!
Here, I wish everyone a happy year of bunny!!!! >w<

* Also Chinese new year, Lunar new year.

title: Hideki patting my head
content:
I and Hideki is now couples!
    When we're together, I love being patted by him!~
    Aweeeee! So comfortable!!!

title: Dating
content:
It's valentine's day!
    I and Hideki sitting on a bench in the Meow Kingdom, enjoying thechocolate that we both love!
    We spent our valentine happily!~

title: Maid
sub: Just a maid. Not sure why it's here.
content:
Uh... It's just another meow who looks just like H***o K***y...
    Wait... Really! I'm not lying reall...
    Well, I admit, that's me who became Hideki's maid...

title: Happy birthday to Chihiro!!!
content:
It's Chihiro's birthday today! And I'm going to give her a surprise too!
These are the thing she indeed like -- Giant narutomaki!

title: Actually I always wanted to be a girl~
sub: I can no longer hide. And this is not a joke.
content:
I've never blamed with those who misrecognized me as a girl.
Actually, I really wanted to be a girl. Just like the Ugly Duckling transforming into the white geese.
I want to change my gender, for real, so that I can finallly be much more cuter, while getting rid of some anoying things.~

title: Happy birthday to me!
sub: I'll keep having fun with everyone, in the future!
content: My first birthday in Yah Den Mainland! Thanks everyone for being together with me!

title: Want some popcorn?
sub: The unique cherry popcorn I have will definitely appeal your mouth!
content:
Have just finished all the project I have, and now I have nothing to do.
How about selling... popcorn?

title: I... Became a cherry meow?
content:
Have just finished all the project I have, and now I have nothing to do.
How about selling... popcorn?

title: Plushie is my favorite!
sub: Cute and fluffy stuff that give me warmth!
content: In my inner heard I've always been like a little gitl. While I had already been loving cute things before, my love on then became deeper after I became the cherry meow!

title: Rocky the cherry meow is here!
sub: I accept my new body happily!
content:
The magic cherry changed me entirely! I'm now cute, femmine, and energetic!

Due to the impact of the cherry, the Meow Kingdom is no longer suitable fot me to live, from now on I'm moving to the cherry forest in the Sakura village!

title: Sand castle
content: After discussing with Hideki, we decided to have fun at the beach near the Sakura village and make a sand castle! We had a lot of fun, building it all the way from afternoon to the sunset...

title: Yukata Festival 2023
sub: Fireworks, yukatas, night parties... Let's have FUN!
content:
Hearing that there are firework show during Yukata Festival in the Sakura Village, I decided to participate!

This is my yukata, with cute cherry pattern!

title: Little magic witch!
sub: I'm ready for the halloween this year!
content:
Last halloween is still like yesterday...

For this time, I'd like to be a kawaii little witch!

title: GIANT TAKOYAKI
sub: Never settle when there's delicious food!
content: I love to eat, and won't settle when there's delicious food!

title: baboo
content: baboo

title: Giant soda
content:
Hideki is a meow who love to glutton, when he meets delicious food, no one can stop him.

And that's why there's a giant bottle of soda for him!

title: Christmas tree of meows (?
content:
This is a christmas tree that use meows as decoration, the star on the top of the tree is powered by a candle and that's why it needs flame... Oh well I don't know how to explain.

WARNING: The fire is fake, and no meows were hurt in this picture.
